title: Dare To Race
description: Gear up your creativity and ignite your passion for speed at CRESCENDO 2024's 'Dare to Race' - where engineering prowess meets the thrill of the track!

title: Peer Pong
description: Dive into the thrill of tech and Ping Pong at CRESCENDO's Peer Pong by Women In Engineering! Score points with precision, conquer tasks, and compete for exciting prizes.

title: Tech-Vista 2024
description: Tech-Vista 2024: Elevate your tech journey with Placement Talks by Vivek Gupta, ICPC World Finalist, and an exhilarating Data Structure and Algorithm contest!

title: National Education Day 2023
description: Elevate National Education Day with AICTE's enlightening ATAL FDP on 'Applied Machine Learning for VLSI Design' led by the accomplished Dr. Vijay Joshi!

title: Ingenium: Igniting Innovation on Engineer's Day
description: Get ready for a jaw-dropping engineering spectacle at Ingenium, where students' ingenuity ignites a thrilling show of innovation!

title: Startup Ecosystem
description: Prof. Heena Pendhari guided us through the 'Startup Ecosystem' event, where everyone explored ideas, innovations, and research.

title: Perfect Pitch Deck Presentation
description: The event is about a brief presentation which showcases key aspects of your business plan and is used to pitch to investors.

title: Prakalp: Project Competition
description: A National level project competition which involves the hardware and software domain

title: Women's Day Celebration 2023
description: Celebrated International Women's Day with Mental Health Awareness Session.

title: Industrial Visit
description: An industrial visit organised by WIE for students of FRCRCE to Sify's data centre

title: Seminar on AI
description: Mr Uday Kamath, an alumni of FRCRCE gave insights in the world of AI

title: Laser Maze
description: IEEE council organized Laser Maze game for Synergy Fest 2k22.

title: CRCE TRANSYLVANIA
description: WIE council organized CRCE themed Escape Room game for the Synergy Fest 2k22.

title: Industrial Visit and Training at SICK INDIA
description: IEEE in association with AI & DS Department organized a visit to SICK INDIA PVT LTD at Naigaon

title: Women Leaders in Startup
description: Mrs. Jyoti Bharadwaj shared her experience as Woman Entrepreneur and Founder

title: Ingenium- Engineer's Day Competition
description: A problem statement and creative solutions bought up by the students.

title: Writing Research Paper and Patent Application
description: Students got important insights from our Principal Sir and his student-Jenil Dave.

title: Succesful Startup Founders
description: Meet alumni of our college, Mr.Mohamad Ahmed; founder of Hridam Surgicals.

title: Women's Day Celebration 2022
description: First offline event after the pandemic to celebrate International Women's Day.

title: Web Designing Workshop
description: A workshop to introduce students to website building and design thinking for web based projects.

title: Women Healthcare Awareness
description: A gynecologist for busting myths about periods, PCOD, PCOS, and female hygiene.

title: Industrial Trends and Technology
description: A session to enlighten students about the industrial trends and the demands that people make from the Industry and how those can be fulfilled.

title: Goal Achievement Program
description: A session exclusively for Fr. CRCE teachers on achieving goals.

title: Succesful Start-Up Founders
description: A webinar for students to gain knowledge about the skills required for entrepreneurship.

title: Technical Paper Webinar
description: Webinar for the students to learn about the selection of a topic and how to write a technical paper.
